per_query.query_text: red diagonal striped pattern filling the frame
green circles on a dark background
blue horizontal lines across the screen
yellow and black checkerboard grid
concentric cyan rings pulsing outward
magenta star shapes scattered on dark background
orange zigzag lines moving across screen
white dots grid pattern blinking on dark background
step one remove
step two clean
step five rinse
step eight tighten
step nine calibrate
step ten verify
swap step with blue line pattern and spoken instruction
check step showing yellow checkerboard with verbal confirmation
install procedure with magenta star indicators and spoken label
alignment step with orange zigzag visual and verbal cue
purple gradient calibration phase with audio announcement
final verify step with teal crosshatch and spoken confirmation
